job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Data Scientist<br><br>• 5+ Years in Machine Learning (currently hands on)<br>• Very Strong in SQL (5+ Years of hands on experience)<br>• Strong hands-on skills on forecasting modelling<br>• Expert in Python Machine Learning Libraries<br>• Applied experience on Regression, Classification, Unsupervised & Optimization techniques .<br>• Experience implementing machine learning solutions in Real Life Analytics Projects (Excluding Academic projects)<br>• Solid fundamentals, knowledge of supervised, unsupervised, machine learning and deep learning algorithms, such as classifiers, cluster analysis, dimension reduction, regression<br>• Experience in implementing NLP(Natural Language Processing) Solutions<br>• Experience with Language models like BERT .<br>• Manage requirements, create specifications<br>• Excellent communication (written/verbal), presentation and facilitation skills<br>• Ability to engage with business teams directly<br>• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail<br>• Great presentation skills<br>• Resilient and flexible, comfortable with ambiguity, and adaptable to fast-changing environment/objectives<br>• Good analytical and problem solving skills<br>• Good understanding of text representation techniques (such as n-grams, a bag of words, sentiment analysis) and semantic extraction techniques.<br><br> <br><br>
